// Only_love97

using namespace std;
#include<bits/stdc++.h>

#define BG begin()
#define ED end()
#define SZ size()
#define st first
#define nd second
#define PB push_back
#define FOR(i,a,b) for (int i=(a),_b=(b);i<_b;i++)
#define FORE(i,a,b) for (int i=(a),_b=(b);i<=_b;i++)
#define FORD(i,a,b) for (int i=(a),_b=(b);i>=_b;i--)
#define ri(n)({\
    int neg=0;\
    n=0;\
    char ch;\
    for(ch=getchar(); ch<'0' || ch>'9'; ch=getchar()) if (ch=='-') neg=1-neg;\
    n=ch-48;\
    for(ch=getchar(); ch>='0' && ch<='9'; ch=getchar()) n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+ch-48;\
    if (neg) n=-n;\
})

typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int,int> II;
const int INF=1000000000+7;
const double esp=1e-13;
const double pi=3.141592653589;
const int MAX=500000;

int f[MAX+10],x,n;
bool d[MAX+10];

int main()
{
 //   freopen("codeforces.inp", "r", stdin);
 //   freopen("D1.out", "w", st
    FORE(i,1,MAX) f[i]=1;
    memset(d,false,sizeof(d));

    FORE(i,2,MAX )
    FORE(j,2,MAX/i)
    {
        if (i>=10000) d[i*j]=true;

        f[i*j]=f[i*j]*(i%10000);

        if(f[i*j]>=10000)
	        {
	            f[i*j]%= 10000;
                d[i*j] = true;
	        }
    }

    ri(n);
    FORE(i,1,n)
    {
        ri(x);
        if (d[x]) printf("%04d\n", f[x]);
        else printf("%d\n", f[x]);
    }
}
